articles.author: Sean Conlon, Sarah Min
articles.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq hit record highs to start the week thanks to gains in tech: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. stocks moved higher on Monday as investors tracked the latest developments in trade and awaited the start of big tech earnings this week.
articles.content:
U.S. stocks moved higher on Monday as investors tracked the latest developments in trade and awaited the start of big tech earnings this week.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Dia launches a skill gallery, Perplexity to add tasks to Comet - techcrunch.com
articles.description: The Browser Company has launched an official repository of "skills" for its Dia browser — shortcuts for prompts that are used frequently.
articles.content: AI-powered browsers are nowhere near the easy future they promise, when they would be able to do complex multi-step tasks for you. However, the makers of these browsers are trying to make users’ live… [+1490 chars]
